about.subTitle: Our Story
about.title: We LOVE number plates!
about.paragraph:
Numberplates.io was founded in 2001 by tech entrepreuner Gurvinder Singh Sandhu. Frustrated with the current process of finding number plates that had already been sold he created a brand new platform so anyone in the UK could list their plate for FREE.

This expanded quickly into allowing users to sell plates using our own social media strategy, get fast free automated valuations and providing the fastest numberplate search in the world.

We are now #1 for Advertising & Selling Number Plates in the UK.

list.listTitle: Try the FASTEST number plate search in the world

about.ctaButtonSubText: We guarantee to get back to you very quickly
